3: Cumal tak ri e a c'ulelanic quintzuritajic, weta'm c'ut ri quinbij chawe.
4: At aweta'm chi amak'el je banom ulok wa' kas aretak c'olinak ulok winak cho ri uwächulew:
5: Ri u jajatem ri banal etzelal man cabeytaj taj; ri u quicotemal xa' re jok'otaj.
6: Pune' sibalaj naj elinak chicaj jacha' ri caj copan ta c'u ri u jolom c'ä pa tak ri sutz',
7: cäsach na u wäch jacha' ri u mes awaj e are' tak c'ut ri rachil man caquetamaj taj ri xuc'ulmaj.
8: Cäsach na u wäch jacha' jun ichic', jacha' jun c'utwächinic re chak'ab, man c'o ta c'u jachin jun cärikowic.
9: Ri xec'oji' can ruc' ri xquil u wäch man caquil ta chi u wäch.
10: Ri e u c'ojol caquitzelej na chque ri mebayib ri reläk'am.
11: C'o pa ronojel ri u chuk'ab xukuje' pa ri ralc'alal cäkaj c'u na chupam ri cämuk wi.
12: Ri etzelal sibalaj qui' cuna' cuc'ol c'u chuxe' ri rak';
13: cumuyej ri u qui'al pa u chi' nojimal cuch'abach'a' pa u chi'.
14: Chanim c'ut caq'uextajic cux u k'inob cumätz chupam.
15: Quebuxawaj ri k'inomal ri e u bik'om; ri Dios queresaj ulok chupam.
16: Cätajin cuca'yej ri u k'inob ri cumätz, are' c'ut we k'inob ri' cacämisan na.
17: Man cacuin taj carechbej ri u q'uiyal ri leche xukuje' ri juyubal räx cab, ri quebelelic e jacha' nima'.
18: Ronojel ri u ch'äcom, cutzelej na; man cacuin ta che rechbexic mawi caquicot pa tak ri u k'inomal.
19: Xebut'orij chque ri mebayib xebuwonoba' c'ut; xerechbej tak ja ri man xebuyac taj.
20: Mawi c'u jubik' xuk'il ta rib che ri u munil, man c'o ta jun jasach ri ma ta xkaj na pa u k'ab;
21: man c'o ta jun jasach ri xto'taj taj chuwäch ri u tz'iyal. Rumal ri' man cabeytaj ta ri utzil pa ri u c'aslemal.
22: Jacha' ri u nimal ri u k'inomal ri u nimal ri c'okonic puwi'; cakaj na ri qui k'ab ri banal tak etzelal puwi'.
23: Aretak cuchomaj u nojisaxic ri u pam, ri Dios cukasaj na ri royowal puwi': cujabarisaj ri royowal puwi'.
24: We cäto'taj chuwäch jun ch'ojibal re räx ch'ich', cariktaj na rumal jun q'uiakbal ch'ab re k'an ch'ich'.
25: Ri ch'ab cujutquej na ri cuerp, ri u wi' ri ch'ab coc'ow chupam ri seseb. Cänoj na che xibin ib;
26: chuq'uisbalil camojcolix na rumal jun k'ekumalil. Jun k'ak' ri man cajwataj ta u k'ak'axic caq'uisow na tzij puwi' xukuje' ronojel ri rachoch.
27: Ri caj cuya' na ri u mac chisak, ri ulew cawalij na che u tzujuxic.
28: Aretak capulin ri royowal ri Dios puwi', quesach na qui wäch conojel ri u k'inomal.
29: Are wa' ri taklebenic ri cuya' na ri Dios che ri lawalo; are' rechbal wa' ri suc'umam che.”
